Expected Behaviour: Company representative registration request is created and pending career staff approval
Failure Indicators: Registration not saved or not visible in career staff approval queue

Expected Behaviour: Career staff can log in using auto-registered credentials from txt file
Failure Indicators: Login fails or txt auto-registration missing

Expected Behaviour: Option 1 displays pending reps and approval marks rep as approved
Failure Indicators: Rep still cannot log in or approval not reflected

Expected Behaviour: Career staff session ends and returns to main menu
Failure Indicators: Still logged in or cannot return to login screen

Test Case: Company rep logs in with password created
Expected Behaviour: Company rep can log in using password created (password123)
Failure Indicators: Login denied or wrong default password

Expected Behaviour: password123 successfully updates to password
Failure Indicators: Old password still works or update not saved

Expected Behaviour: Internship entered and marked as pending career staff approval
Failure Indicators: Internship not saved or missing in approval list

Expected Behaviour: Session ends and returns to main menu
Failure Indicators: Session persists or cannot navigate back

Expected Behaviour: Career staff login successful
Pending internship opportunities are displayed
Internship becomes active and visible to students
Failure Indicators: Internship remains pending or does not appear to students

Expected Behaviour: Session ends normally

Test Case: Student logs in with default password
Expected Behaviour: Student auto-registered with default password, "password"
Failure Indicators: Cannot log in or student not auto-registered

Expected Behaviour: Password updates correctly to "password1"
Failure Indicators: Old password works or update not saved

Expected Behaviour: Student sees only internships matching profile
Filtered internship list displayed correctly
Failure Indicators: Filters return incorrect or no results

Expected Behaviour: System accepts up to 3 active applications pending company approval
Failure Indicators: More than 3 allowed or applications not submitted

Test Case: Student requests withdrawal for one application
Expected Behaviour: Withdrawal request appears in career staff queue
Failure Indicators: Request not created or not visible to staff

Expected Behaviour: Session ends normally
Career staff login successful
All internships displayed with functioning filter options

Test Case: Career staff selects option 3 (manage withdrawal requests)
Expected Behaviour: Pending withdrawal request shown
Application removed and student updated with withdrawn status
Failure Indicators: Status unchanged or still appears active

Expected Behaviour: Session ends normally
Rep login successful

Test Case: Company rep selects option 2 (view my internships)
Expected Behaviour: Rep sees only their own internships and filters work
Pending student applications are displayed
Application status updated to “Approved by Company”
Session ends normally
Student sees updated application statuses
Student selects one successful application; system auto-withdraws other applications
Withdrawal request created and pending staff approval
Session ends normally
Login successful
Internship placement removed and student eligible to apply again
Logout successful

Test Case: Student logs in and checks status
Expected Behaviour: Student sees updated status and allowed to apply again
System allows new applications
